Message:
Being a witch,
I never had friends.

Just Mom, Dad, and a bunch
of pretty flowers.

It may not have been much,
but that’s all I needed
to be happy.

One day, Mom looked at me,
and in a serious tone,

told me to go pick some flowers
from a garden far away.

I had never seen Mom
with such a scary face.

But, I did as I was told
and made my way to
the garden.

If I bring lots of flowers back,
she’s sure to be happy.
